scripts.deploy: cd services/test01 && AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v
scripts.deploy-function: cd services/test01 && AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy function -f hello
scripts.invoke: cd services/test01 && AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless invoke -f hello -l
scripts.logs: cd services/test01 && AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless logs -f hello -t
scripts.remove: cd services/test01 && AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foobar AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=foobar SLS_DEBUG=* serverless remove
